A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The few moments of greatness are choked out by a terribly written story which may have killed off the future of Star Wars. It was interesting to watch (once)\, but for the world of Star Wars\, it was a complete disaster. There is nothing to talk about for the next two years and nothing to be anxious for. Nothing but a sense of disappointment lingers. The character decisions made in this film have actually soiled some of the previous films. It's that bad. So much potential wasted.
